sentences.english: Autopolyploids are genetically isolated from their parental diploids .
sentences.chinese: 同源多倍體與其親本二倍體在遺傳上相隔離。

sentences.english: There are obvious difference on morphology and cytology between polypoid and diploid .
sentences.chinese: 四倍體與二倍體在形態學和細胞學上有明顯差異。

sentences.english: Atypical subdiploid peak was observed by flow cytometry.
sentences.chinese: 流式細胞儀檢測出現典型的亞二倍體凋亡峯。

sentences.english: Almost all of the animals and more than half of the higher plants are diploid.
sentences.chinese: 幾乎全部的動物和過半數的高等植物都是二倍體。

sentences.english: The stoma characters of both tetraploid and diploid Anthuriums were comparatively investigated.
sentences.chinese: 對紅掌四倍體和二倍體材料的氣孔特徵進行了研究。

sentences.english: This paper first reports the formation and cytogenetic characteristics of sesquidiploidsbetween rapeseed(Brassica napus L.
sentences.chinese: 該植株作母本再與甘藍型油菜雜交獲得其倍半二倍體。

sentences.english: Typical apoptotic sub G1 peak was observed by flow cytometer.
sentences.chinese: 流式細胞術分析可見明顯的亞二倍體凋亡峯。

sentences.english: The new synthetic wheats were obtained from the selfed hybrids.
sentences.chinese: 從這些自交後代產生了新的人工合成小麥雙二倍體。

sentences.english: Under the same temperature, the electrolyte exosmosis rate of tetraploid plants were lower than diploid plants.
sentences.chinese: 相同低溫下，辣木四倍體的電解質外滲率低於二倍體。

sentences.english: These are tetraploids. and there is the einkorn, which is a diploid.
sentences.chinese: 此外還有一粒小麥，是二倍體。

sentences.english: The cells of the blastula, called blastomeres, also each receive a full diploid set of chromosomes.
sentences.chinese: 這些囊胚細胞，稱卵裂球，每個細胞都有一套二倍體。

sentences.english: Only a small, sequestered breeding stock is allowed to remain diploid.
sentences.chinese: 只有一小羣隔離開來的種魚可以保持爲二倍體。

sentences.english: Of the six fungal classes only the oomycetes usually have a diploid vegetative state.
sentences.chinese: 只有卵菌綱通常有二倍體的營養狀態。

sentences.english: The development of embryos from diploid somatic cells in embryo culture.
sentences.chinese: 是胚胎培養過程中，二倍體細胞發育爲胚胎的過程。

sentences.english: The diploid condition is restored when the nuclei of two gametes fuse to give the zygote.
sentences.chinese: 當兩個配子核融合形成合子時，又恢復二倍體狀態。

sentences.english: Embryonic stem cells cultured for 15 passages stably retaind a normal karyotype.
sentences.chinese: 傳15代後仍表現正常的二倍體核型。
